message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $180. Let me know what you think!
Thanks for the offer, Alice! I'm interested in the product, but $180 is a bit too high for me.  Would you consider $110?
I understand you're looking for a good deal, Bob. I'm willing to meet you halfway. I can offer it to you for $160. Let me know if that works for you!
I appreciate you coming down on the price, Alice.  How about we split the difference again and settle at $135?
I can see you're really interested in the product, Bob! I'm willing to make one more concession. I can offer it to you for $155. Let me know if that's a price you're comfortable with!
